p: In cases 1 to 5, the mean Ct values of the initial sputum samples, collected on illness days 1–3, were 17, 25, 30, 19, and 31 respectively, which increased to 19, 35, 33, 29, and 40 respectively, in samples collected on illness days 8–10. LPV/r was administered to case 1 on illness days 5–8 and to case 2 on illness days 2–14, and an increase of Ct values between these two time points was 0.9 per day in case 1 and 2, compared to an increase of 1.0 per day between these time points in case 3, 4 and 5 which were not administered LPV/r ( Fig. 2A).
